short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add functionality to cardmarket site such as export wants, remember the last wantlist used and many more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add functionality to cardmarket site such as export wants, remember the last wantlist used, export cardmarket orders into a CSV importable in ManaBox and many others
